description: Erection of single storey side porch extension. Formation of raised roof to first floor rear outrigger with associated changes to fenestration. Hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension

decision_conditions: The proposed development does not fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A.1 (d), (f), (g), (i), (j) & (ja) of Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the rooflight inserted on the roof would not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof. Therefore in conflict with Condition C.1 (b) of Class C, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The height of the proposed porch would be more than 3 metres above ground level, in conflict with Condition D.1 (c) of Class D of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
